participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, always striving for self-improvement.
participant_1.background: i'm a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm. i now live in the city. i'm a 45 year old male. i take many medications and some of them make me see things.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: easy-going and adventurous, often seeking thrill in new experiences.
participant_2.background: i work from home. i watch too much tv in spare time. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship.

content.text: Hey! Are you a recovering alcoholic? Because I am.
